name: Photogenic Comet
description:
UPDATE 6 JAN: Version 1.0.1 adds some fixes and improvements. Added Mac & Linux builds.

Take control of a comet travelling through the solar system to reach Earth and pass close to it without crashing. Consists of 6 levels of gravity-based gameplay.

Made by Kostas Ventouras of junkbytes.com for Hangover Gamejam 2016 (Theme: Comet) in one day.
